message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,250,000. I believe this reflects the significant return on investment you'll see.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to commit up to $1,500,000 for it. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To make this work, I could come down to $2,000,000. This is my final offer.

Thank you for considering my position, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still unable to commit more than $1,500,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that respects both our positions.
